author: @Bouh
description:
Provides an action for changing the type of the cursor (on Windows, macOS and Linux). 

Cursors can be: 
default, pointer, help, progress, wait, cell, crosshair, text, move, grab, grabbing, not-allowed, zoom-in, zoom-out
name: CursorType
shortDescription: Provides an action for changing the type of the cursor (on Windows, macOS and Linux).

eventsFunctions.description: Change the type of the cursor. Valid cursor names are "default", "pointer", "help", "progress", "wait", "cell", "crosshair", "text", "move", "grab", "grabbing", "not-allowed", "zoom-in" or "zoom-out".
eventsFunctions.fullName: Change the type of the cursor
eventsFunctions.name: ChangeCursorType

events.comment:
List of all cursors can be found here:
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/cursor

parameters.description: The name of the new cursor ("default", "pointer", "help", etc...)
parameters.name: style_cursor
